P. Oxy. LXII, 4844-4930. - I. New Testament (4844-4845). - II. Hexameter Poetry (4846-4853). - III. Rhetorical Texts (4854-4855). - IV. Documents of the Roman Period (4856-4892). - V. Documents of the Byzantine Period (4893-4930).
bibl.seg: GONIS N. and D. COLOMO, with contributions by A. BENAISSA, L. CAPPONI, W.E.H. COCKLE, J. DE JONG, C. MELIADÒ, A. NODAR, A. SYRKOU, J.D. THOMAS, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXII (Nos 4844-4930). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 92.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2008, 8°, xiii-203 pp., tabl., 1 arbre généal. et XVI pll. coul. ISBN 978-0-85698-181-4. £65.

P. Oxy. LXII, 4844-4930. - I. New Testament (4844-4845). - II. Hexameter Poetry (4846-4853). - III. Rhetorical Texts (4854-4855). - IV. Documents of the Roman Period (4856-4892). - V. Documents of the Byzantine Period (4893-4930).
Gonis Colomo Benaissa Capponi Cockle de Jong Meliadò Nodar Syrkou Thomas
